add_library(tx-replication-ut_helpers INTERFACE)
target_link_libraries(tx-replication-ut_helpers INTERFACE
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  ydb-core-base
  ydb-core-protos
  core-testlib-default
  tx-replication-ydb_proxy
  cpp-client-ydb_topic
  cpp-testing-unittest
)
target_sources(tx-replication-ut_helpers INTERFACE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tx/replication/ut_helpers/test_env.h

)
